nz_affix_nzOffsetBottom.description: Pixels to offset from bottom when calculating position of scroll

nz_affix_nzOffsetTop.description: Pixels to offset from top when calculating position of scroll

nz_attr_nzChange.description: Callback for when component is changed

nz_attr_nzMouseEnterDelay.description: Delay in seconds, before tooltip is shown on mouse enter

nz_attr_nzMouseLeaveDelay.description: Delay in seconds, before tooltip is hidden on mouse leave

nz_attr_nzOverlayClassName.description: Class name of the tooltip card

nz_attr_nzPlaceHolder.body: nzPlaceHolder="${1|Please select,Required,Please select time,Please select date|}"

nz_attr_nzPopupStyle.description: to customize the style of the popup

nz_attr_nzVisible.description: Whether the component is visible or not.

nz_autocomplete_custom-label.body: {{group.title}} More {{option.title}} {{option.count}}

nz_badge_nzShowZero.description: Whether to show badge when `count` is zero

nz_button_icon-text-left.description: Button with icon and text on left

nz_button_icon-text-right.description: Button with icon and text on right

nz_button_nzBlock.description: option to fit button width to its parent width

nz_button_nzGhost.description: make background transparent and invert text and border colors

nz_card_tab.body:
<nz-card style="width: 100%;">
  <nz-card-tab>
    <nz-tabset nzSize="large" [(nzSelectedIndex)]="${1:idx}">
      <nz-tab nzTitle="article"></nz-tab>
      <nz-tab nzTitle="app"></nz-tab>
      <nz-tab nzTitle="project"></nz-tab>
    </nz-tabset>
  </nz-card-tab>
  <ng-container *ngIf="$1 === 0">Content article</ng-container>
  <ng-container *ngIf="$1 === 1">Content app</ng-container>
  <ng-container *ngIf="$1 === 2">Content project</ng-container>
</nz-card>

nz_checkbox_layout.body:
<nz-checkbox-wrapper style="width: 100%;" (nzOnChange)="${1:change}($event)">
  <nz-row>
    <nz-col nzSpan="8">
      <label nz-checkbox nzValue="A" [ngModel]="true">A</label>
    </nz-col>
    <nz-col nzSpan="8">
      <label nz-checkbox nzValue="B">B</label>
    </nz-col>
  </nz-row>
</nz-checkbox-wrapper>

nz_date.body: <nz-date-picker [(ngModel)]="${1:value}" name="${1}" nzPlaceHolder="${3|Please select data,Please select begin time,Please select end time|}"${4: nzShowTime}></nz-date-picker>

nz_date_nzDateRender.description: custom rendering function for date cells (Not support by month-picker/year-picker)

nz_date_nzDisabledDate.description: specify the date that cannot be selected (Not support by year-picker)

nz_date_nzShowTime.description: to provide an additional time selection

nz_dropdown_button.style.body:
• $0
  • 2nd menu item

nz_dropdown.body:
${1}
  • $0
  • 2nd menu item

nz_form_explain-error.description: A error message and only one

nz_form_extra.description: The extra prompt message. It is similar to help.

nz_form_item.description: Used to separate the item in forms, contains label(optional) and control field.

nz_form_label-responsive.description: The label of the form item.

nz_form_label.description: The label of the form item, optional.

nz_form_nzHasFeedback.description: Used with `nzValidateStatus`, this option specifies the validation status icon. Recommended to be used only with Input.

nz_form_nzValidateStatus.description: Will generate status based on FormControl

nz_grid_nzAlign.description: the vertical alignment of the flex layout

nz_grid_nzJustify.description: horizontal arrangement of the flex layout

nz_grid_nzOffset.description: the number of cells to offset Col from the left

nz_grid_nzOrder.description: raster order, used in `flex` layout mode

nz_grid_nzPull.description: the number of cells that raster is moved to the left

nz_grid_nzPush.description: the number of cells that raster is moved to the right

nz_grid_nzSpan.description: raster number of cells to occupy, 0 corresponds to `display: none`

nz_input_addon-icon.body:
<nz-input-group${1: nzCompact}${2: nzAddonBeforeIcon="anticon anticon-setting"}${3: nzAddonAfterIcon="anticon anticon-setting"}>
  <input nz-input [(ngModel)]="${4:name}" id="${4}" name="${4}"${5: placeholder="${5}"}>
</nz-input-group>
$0

nz_input_addon-text.body:
<nz-input-group${1: nzCompact}${2: nzAddonBefore="http://"}${3: nzAddonAfter="RMB"}>
  <input nz-input [(ngModel)]="${4:name}" id="${4}" name="${4}"${5: placeholder="${5}"}>
</nz-input-group>
$0

nz_input_group.body:
<nz-input-group${1: nzCompact}${2: nzSearch}>
  <input nz-input [(ngModel)]="${2:name}" id="${2}" name="${2}"${3: placeholder="${4}"}>
</nz-input-group>
$0

nz_input_nzAddonAfterIcon.description: The label icon's ngClass displayed after

nz_input_nzAddonBeforeIcon.description: The label icon's ngClass displayed before

nz_input_nzPrefix.description: The prefix icon for the Input

nz_input_nzSuffix.description: The suffix icon for the Input

nz_input_prefix.body: <input nz-input [(ngModel)]="${1:name}" id="${1}" name="${1}" nzPrefix="anticon anticon-${2:user}"${3: placeholder="${4}"}>

nz_input_search.body:
<nz-input-group nzSearch nzSize="${1|small,middle,large,default|}" [nzSuffix]="${2}Tpl">
  <input nz-input [(ngModel)]="${2:name}" name="${2}"${3: placeholder="${4}"}>
  <ng-template #${2}Tpl>
    <button nz-button nzType="primary" nzSize="${1}" nzSearch>${5|Search,Save,Confirm|}</button>
  </ng-template>
</nz-input-group>

nz_input_suffix.body: <input nz-input [(ngModel)]="${1:name}" id="${1}" name="${1}" nzSuffix="anticon anticon-${2:user}"${3: placeholder="${4}"}>

nz_input-number_nzFormatter.description: Specifies the format of the value presented

nz_input-number_nzParser.description: Specifies the value extracted from nzFormatter

nz_layout_content.description: The content layout with default style

nz_list_loadmore.body: edit more {{item.name.last}}

nz_list_nzGrid.description: The grid type of list. You can set grid to something like `{gutter: 16, column: 4}`

nz_list_nzItemLayout.description: The layout of list, default is `horizontal`, If a vertical list is desired, set the itemLayout property to `vertical`

nz_menu.body:
• ${1:Menu Item}
  • Sub Menu Title
    • Menu Item

nz_menu_nzInlineCollapsed.description: specifies the collapsed status when menu is inline mode

nz_menu_nzInlineIndent.description: indent px of inline menu item on each level

nz_pagination_nzHideOnSinglePage.description: Whether to hide pager on single page

nz_popconfirm_nzCondition.description: Whether to directly emit `onConfirm` without showing Popconfirm

nz_progress_nzProgressStatus.description: to set the status of the Progress

nz_select_nzDropdownMatchSelectWidth.description: Whether dropdown's with is same with select

nz_select_nzMaxMultipleCount.description: Max selected option can be selected

nz_select_nzNotFoundContent.description: Specify content to show when no result matches

nz_select_nzOnSearch.description: Callback function that is fired when input changed

nz_select_nzServerSearch.description: nz-option will not be filtered when set to true

nz_select_nzShowSearch.description: Whether show search input in single mode

nz_sider_nzCollapsed.description: the collapsed status can be double binding

nz_sider_nzCollapsedWidth.description: width of the collapsed sidebar, by setting to 0 a special trigger will appear

nz_sider_nzReverseArrow.description: reverse direction of arrow, for a sider that expands from the right

nz_sider_nzWidth.description: Specify the column width, can not used when grouping columns

nz_spin_nzDelay.description: specifies a delay in milliseconds for loading state

nz_spin_nzTip.description: Customize description content when Spin has children

nz_steps_custom-dot.body:
<nz-steps [(nzCurrent)]="${1:current}" [nzProgressDot]="${2:progressTemplate}">
  <nz-step nzTitle="Finished" nzDescription="You can hover on the dot."></nz-step>
  $0
</nz-steps>
<ng-template #${2} let-dot let-status="status" let-index="index">
</ng-template>

nz_table.body:
Title $3 {{i.title}} $4 Edit Remove${5: More
  • active
}

nz_table_nzFrontPagination.description: Whether paginate data in front side，should set to `false` if you want to paginate data in server side or display all data in table

nz_table_nzLeft.description: Left pixels, used to fixed column to left

nz_table_nzRight.description: Right pixels, used to fixed column to right

nz_table_nzShowPagination.description: Whether show pagination component in bottom of the table

nz_table_nzShowQuickJumper.description: Determine whether you can jump to pages directly

nz_table_nzWidth.description: Specify the column width, can not used when grouping columns

nz_table_static-no-pager.body: $0 {{${2}.title}} Next Edit Delete

nz_tabs.body:
<nz-tabset>
  <nz-tab nzTitle="Tab 1">
    Content of Tab Pane 1
  </nz-tab>
  <nz-tab nzTitle="Tab 2">
    Content of Tab Pane 2
  </nz-tab>
  <nz-tab nzTitle="Tab 3">
    Content of Tab Pane 3
  </nz-tab>
</nz-tabset>

nz_tabs_nzAnimated.description: Whether to change tabs with animation

nz_tabs_nzForceRender.description: Forced render of content in tabs, not lazy render after clicking on tabs

nz_textarea.body: <textarea nz-input [(ngModel)]="${1:remark}" id="${1}" name="${1}" [nzAutosize]="${2|true,false,{ minRows: 2 <Change to comma by yourself> maxRows: 6 }|}"${3: placeholder="${4}"}></textarea>$0

nz_textarea_nzAutosize.body: [nzAutosize]="${1|true,false,{ minRows: 2 <Change to comma by yourself> maxRows: 6 }|}"
nz_textarea_nzAutosize.description: Only used for `textarea`, height autosize feature, can be set to boolean or an object `{ minRows: 2, maxRows: 6 }`

nz_upload_drag.body:
Click or drag file to this area to upload

Support for a single or bulk upload. Strictly prohibit from uploading company data or other band files

 $0

nz_upload_nzBeforeUpload.description: this function is not supported in `IE9`. NOTICE: Muse be use `=>` to define the method.

nz_upload_nzCustomRequest.description: override for the default xhr behavior allowing for additional customization and ability to implement your own XMLHttpRequest. NOTICE: Muse be use `=>` to define the method.

nz_upload_nzFilterLimit.description: limit single upload count when `nzMultiple` has opened. `0` unlimited

nz_upload_nzMultiple.description: Whether to support selected multiple file. IE10+ supported. You can select multiple files with CTRL holding down while multiple is set to be true

nz_upload_nzShowUploadList.description: Whether to show default upload list, could be an object to specify `showPreviewIcon` and `showRemoveIcon` individually
